EmailTemplate.description: Email Template used for sending Neo4j Graph Data Science (neo4j-gds) License Keys to customer. Added in SFDC-0257.
EmailTemplate.name: Neo4J Send Neo4j Graph Data Science (neo4j-gds) License Key To Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Activation key for {!License_Key__c.Feature__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!License_Key__c.Registrant_First_Name__c}, Thank you for choosing the Neo4j graph database platform!
Your activation key for {!License_Key__c.Feature__c} is attached to this email. This key is set to expire on {!License_Key__c.X_Expiration_Date_Formatted__c}.
If installing for the first time, please download the latest Graph Data Science Library release from https://neo4j.com/download-center/#algorithms and activate GDS enterprise using this key. Please refer to the Graph Data Science Library documentation at https://neo4j.com/docs/graph-data-science/current/installation/ for detailed instructions.
If you have any questions, please reach out to {!License_Key__c.Sales_Rep_Name__c} at {!License_Key__c.Sales_Rep_Email__c}. Cheers, {!User.FirstName}
